ComicInfo.Summary: Star solves a hostage situation and stops a runaway train, and soon afterwards, rock star Peter Klaptin and his bodyguard Chris Robinson train themselves for combat. After Klaptin witnesses questionable actions on a boat in Lake Michigan, Star flies into action, only to be captured by tiny model airplanes, which attempt to impale him on a radio spire.
